item.title: Communications Assistant
item.description:
We’re seeking a dynamic Communications Assistant to support our mission of advancing population health through effective storytelling and strategic communication.

About the Role

As a Communications Assistant at GPHA, you’ll contribute to:

  • Creating engaging content for our website, newsletter, and blog
  • Managing and growing our social media presence across multiple platforms
  • Developing visual materials including infographics, presentations, and reports
  • Supporting event communication for webinars, conferences, and workshops
  • Translating complex research findings into accessible content for diverse audiences
  • Maintaining our digital asset library and communication calendars

Requirements

  • Currently enrolled in or recently completed studies in Communications, Journalism, Public Relations, or related field
  • Strong writing and editing skills with ability to adapt tone for different audiences
  • Experience with social media management and content creation
  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
  • Commitment of 5-10 hours per week

item.title: Research Assistant
item.description:
We’re seeking multiple Part-time Research Assistants to support our interdisciplinary research projects addressing critical challenges in population health.

About the Role

As a Research Assistant at GPHA, you’ll contribute to:

  • Conducting literature reviews and systematic evidence synthesis
  • Performing quantitative data analysis using demographic and health datasets
  • Supporting computational modeling of population health dynamics
  • Preparing research briefs, reports, and policy documents
  • Assisting with manuscript preparation for peer-reviewed publications

Requirements

  • Currently enrolled in or recently completed graduate studies (Master’s or PhD)
  • Strong quantitative and analytical skills
  • Proficiency in statistical software (R, Stata, Python, or similar)
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks
  • Commitment of 10 hours per week
